title: Boris Johnson’s Downing Street Criticized in Report Over Parties During Lockdowns
sub_head: Gatherings shouldn’t have happened, says government report, citing failures of leadership
body:
LONDON—British police are investigating two gatherings at Prime Minister Boris Johnson’s residence during a Covid-19 lockdown, a government report said Monday, strengthening the hand of rebellious lawmakers in his Conservative Party who are seeking to oust the British leader.
The report, compiled by senior civil servant Sue Gray, outlined 16 social events that took place in government offices over the past two years during times when ordinary Britons were ordered to avoid or reduce socializing. The report said a dozen of those events are now subject to a continuing police investigation.
